sentences.english: Major non-conformities should require on-site verification within 80 days.
sentences.chinese: 嚴重不符合項應該要求在80天內完成現場驗證工作。

sentences.english: The strengthening of Ji'nan awning construction site for electricity.
sentences.chinese: 加強濟南遮陽蓬施工現場的用電辦理。

sentences.english: Yang Hong and accepts the director East on-the-spot coverage in the Nanjing Television station.

sentences.english: CTD Profiling System is the principal instrument for acquiring hydrographic data in situ.
sentences.chinese: CTD剖面儀是現場獲取水文數據的主要儀器。

sentences.english: The conclusions can provide references for the field performance of hydrau- perforating and fracturing.

sentences.english: Field tests of influences of working load on negative skin friction behaviors were introduced.

sentences.english: In two field tests, three directional holes are drilled successfully.
sentences.chinese: 在兩次現場試驗中，成功地實鑽了三眼定向孔。

sentences.english: Wang Shunsheng and his visiting members visited several water conservancy project sites to learn about the progress of the on-going construction.
sentences.chinese: 王順生一行先後去到多個水利工程現場瞭解建設情況。

sentences.english: Francis is accused of having helped him to concoct a false alibi.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯因幫助他捏造不在犯罪現場的證據而被起訴。

sentences.english: Afterward, the reporter then contact the West jinlingzhen related leadership to carry out inspections.

sentences.english: Viewers around the world can catch a live webcast of the sold-out event in New York.

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Jieyuan gel bait on killing Blattella germanica.
